upgrade.tardisrefined_example.force_fiel: Generates a protective force field around the TARDIS, enhancing its defense capabilities.
upgrade.tardisrefined_example.holographi: Provides the TARDIS with a holographic disguise, making it blend into its surroundings.
upgrade.tardisrefined_example.teleportat: Allows the TARDIS to teleport to a different location.
upgrade.tardisrefined_example.time_trave: Unlocks the ability to travel through time, allowing the TARDIS to visit different eras and periods.
upgrade.tardisrefined_example.wormhole_j: Enables the TARDIS to perform a quick and efficient wormhole jump to a specified location.
